Verses: 1 thaaveedhu Raamaavukkatuththa Naayodhilirundhu Otippoi, Yonaththaan Munpaaka Vandhu: Ummutaiya Thakappan En Piraananai Vaangaththetukiraare, Naan Seydhadhu Enna? En Akkiramam Enna? Naan Avarukkuch Cheydha Thurokam Enna? Endraan.

2 adharku Avan: Appati Orukkaalum Varaadhu; Neer Saavadhillai, Idho, Enakku Arivikkaamal En Thakappan Periya Kaariyamaanaalum Siriyakaariyamaanaalum Ondrum Seykiradhillai; Indhak Kaariyaththai En Thakappan Enakku Maraippaanen? Appati Irukkamaattaadhu Endraan.

3 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu: Ummutaiya Kankalil Enakkuth Thayaikitaiththadhu Endru Ummutaiya Thakappan Nandraai Arivaar; Aakaiyaal Yonaththaanukku Mananovu Untaakaadhapatikku Avan Idhai Ariyappokaadhu Enpaar; Maranaththirkum Enakkum Oru Ati Thooramaaththiram Irukkiradhu Endru Karththarutaiya Jeevanaiyum Ummutaiya Jeevanaiyum Kontu Nichchayamaaich Chollukiren Endru Marumozhi Solli Aanaiyittaan.
4 appozhudhu Yonaththaan Thaaveedhaip Paarththu: Umadhu Manaviruppam Innadhu Endru Sollum, Adhinpati Umakkuch Cheyven Endraan.

5 thaaveedhu Yonaththaanai Nokki: Idho, Naalaikku Amaavaasi, Naan Raajaavote Pandhiyirundhu Saappitaventiyadhaayirukkum; Aanaalum Naan Moondraam Naal Saayangaalamattum Veliyile Oliththirukkumpati Enakku Uththaravu Kotum.

6 ummutaiya Thakappan Ennaik Kuriththu Visaariththaal, Than Ooraakiya Pedhlakemile Than Kutumpaththaar Yaavarum Varushaththukku Orudharam Paliyitavarukirapatiyaal Thaaveedhu Avvitaththirkup Poka Ennitaththil Varundhikkettaan Endru Neer Sollum.
7 adharku Avar Nalladhu Endraal, Ummutaiya Atiyaanukkuch Chamaadhaanam Irukkum; Avarukku Erichchaluntaanaal, Avaraale Pollaapputh Theermaanappattirukkiradhu Endru Arindhukolveer.

8 aakaiyaal Ummutaiya Atiyaanukkuth Thayaiseyyaventum; Karththarukku Munpaaka Ummutaiya Atiyaanote Utanpatikkai Panniyirukkireere; Ennil Oru Akkiramam Irundhadheyaanaal, Neere Ennaik Kondrupotum; Neer Ennai Ummutaiya Thakappanitaththukkuk Kontupokaventiyadhu Enna Endraan.

9 appozhudhu Yonaththaan: Appati Umakku Varaadhiruppadhaaka; Umakkup Pollaappuch Cheyya En Thakappanaale Theermaaniththirukkiradhu Endru Naan Nichchayamaai Arindhenaanaal Naan Adhai Umakku Arivikkaadhiruppeno Endraan.
10 thaaveedhu Yonaththaanai Nokki: Ummutaiya Thakappan Katinamaana Uththaram Sonnaal Adhai Yaar Enakku Arivippaar Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Yonaththaan Thaaveedhaip Paarththu: Oorukku Veliye Povom Vaarum Endraan; Iruvarum Veliye Purappattupponaarkal.

12 appozhudhu Yonaththaan Isravelin Thevanaakiya Karththarai Munnittuth Thaaveedhai Nokki: Naan Naalaiyaavadhu, Marunaalilaavadhu En Thakappanutaiya Manadhai Arindhukontu, Avar Thaaveedhinmel Thayavaayirukkiraar Endru Kantum, Adhai Appodhu Umadhu Sevikalukku Velippatuththumpatikku, Umakkuch Cholliyanuppaadhirundhaal,

13 isravelin Thevanaakiya Karththar Yonaththaanukku Adharkuch Chariyaakavum Adharku Adhikamaakavum Seyyakkatavar; Aanaalum Umakkuth Theengu Seyya En Thakappanukkup Piriyamaayirundhaal, Adhai Umadhu Sevikalukku Velippatuththi, Neer Samaadhaanaththote Pokumpatikku Ummai Anuppivituven; Karththar En Thakappanotu Irundhadhupol, Ummotum Iruppaaraaka.
14 melum, Naan Uyirotirukkaiyil, Naan Saakaadhapatikku Neer Karththarin Nimiththamaai Enakkuth Thayaiseyyaventiyadhum Allaamal,
15 karththar Thaaveedhin Saththurukkalaakiya Ovvoruvaraiyum Poomiyinmel Iraadhapatikku, Ver Arukkumpodhum, Neer Endraikkum Umadhu Thayavai En Veettaivittu Akatrivitaamalum Irukkaventum Endraan.
16 ippati Yonaththaan Thaaveedhin Kutumpaththote Utanpatikkaipanni, Thaaveedhutaiya Saththurukkalin Kaiyile Karththar Kanakkuk Ketpaaraaka Endru Solli,
17 yonaththaan Thaaveedhai Mikavum Sinekiththapatiyinaal, Pinnum Avanukku Aanaiyittaan; Than Uyiraich Chinekiththadhupola Avanaich Chinekiththaan.
18 pinpu Yonaththaan Thaaveedhaip Paarththu: Naalaikku Amaavaasi, Neer Utkaaraventiya Itam Kaaliyaayiruppadhinaal Ummaikkuriththu Visaarikkappatum.
19 kaariyam Natandhapodhu, Moondraam Naalile Neer Oliththirukkum Itaththirkuth Theeviriththu Vandhu, Esel Ennum Kallantaiyil Utkaarndhirum.
20 appozhudhu Naan Kurippuvaiththu Eykiradhupola, Adharkup Pakkamaaka Moondru Ampukalai Eydhu:

21 nee Poi, Andha Ampukalaith Theti Vaa Endru Oru Pillaiyaantaanai Anuppuven; Idho, Ampukal Unakku Ippuraththile Kitakkiradhu, Avaikalai Etuththukkontuvaa Endru Pillaiyaantaanitaththil Naan Sonnaal, Neer Vaarum; Appozhudhu Ondrum Illai, Umakkuch Chamaadhaanam Irukkum Endrukarththarutaiya Jeevanaikkontu Sollukiren.
22 idho, Ampukal Unakku Appuraththile Kitakkiradhu Endru Naan Andha Pillaiyaantaanitaththil Sonnaal, Neer Poivitum; Appozhudhu Karththar Ummaip Pokachchollukiraar Endru Ariyum.
23 neerum Naanum Pesikkonta Kaariyaththirku, Idho, Karththar Enakkum Umakkum Endraikkum Natunirkum Saatchi Endraan.
24 appatiye Thaaveedhu Veliyile Oliththukkontirundhaan; Amaavaasiyaanapodhu Raajaa Pojanam Panna Utkaarndhaan.
25 raajaa Suvarantaiyilirukkira Than Itaththil Eppodhumpol Utkaarndha Podhu, Yonaththaan Ezhundhirundhaan; Apnero Savulutaiya Pakkaththil Utkaarndhaan; Thaaveedhu Irukkum Itam Kaaliyaayirundhadhu.
26 aanaalum Avan Theettaayirukkiraanaakkum, Avan Theettuppattuththaan Irukkaventum Endru Andraiyadhinam Savul Ondrum Sollavillai.

27 amaavaasikku Marunaalilum Thaaveedhu Irukkum Itam Kaaliyaayirundhadhu; Appozhudhu Savul: Eesaayin Makan Netrum Indrum Pojanaththukku Varaadheponadhu Enna Endru Than Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaanaik Kettaan.
28 yonaththaan Savulukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaka: Pedhlekemmattum Poka, Thaaveedhu Ennitaththil Varundhikkettu,

29 ange Naan Pokaventum; Engal Kutumpaththaar Oorile Paliyitap Pokiraarkal; En Thamaiyan Ennai Varumpati Kattalaiyittaar; Ummutaiya Kankalil Enakkuth Thayaikitaiththadhaanaal, Naan En Sakodhararaip Paarkkiradharkup Poka Enakku Uththaravu Kotum Endraan; Idhanaaledhaan Avan Raajaavin Pandhikku Varavillai Endraan.

30 appozhudhu Savul Yonaththaanmel Kopamoontavanaaki, Avanaip Paarththu: Irantakamum Maarupaatumullavalin Makane, Nee Unakku Vetkamaakavum, Un Thaayin Maanaththirku Vetkamaakavum, Eesaayin Makanaith Thozhanaakath Therindhukontirukkiradhai Naan Ariyeno?
31 eesaayin Makan Poomiyinmel Uyirotirukkum Naalvaraiyum Neeyaanaalum Un Raajyapaaramaanaalum Nilaippatuvadhillai; Ippodhe Avanai Azhaippiththu, Ennitaththil Kontuvaa; Avan Saakaventum Endraan.
32 yonaththaan Than Thakappanaakiya Savulukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaka: Avan En Kollappataventum? Avan Enna Seydhaan Endraan.
33 appozhudhu Savul: Avanaik Kuththippota Avanmel Eettiyai Erindhaan; Aakaiyaal Thaaveedhaik Kondru Potath Than Thakappan Theermaaniththirukkiraan Enpadhai Yonaththaan Arindhukontu,

34 kopadhaapamaai Pandhiyaivittu Ezhundhirundhupoi, Amaavaasiyin Marunaalaakiya Andraiyadhinam Pojanam Pannaadhirundhaan; Than Thakappan Thaaveedhai Nindhiththuch Chonnadhu Avanukku Mananovaayirundhadhu.
35 marunaal Kaalame, Yonaththaan Thaaveedhukkuk Kuriththaneraththile Oru Sirupillaiyaantaanaik Koottik Kontu, Veliye Purappattuppoi;
36 pillaiyaantaanai Nokki: Nee Oti, Naan Eykira Ampukalaith Theti Etuththuk Kontuvaa Endru Solli, Andhap Pillaiyaantaan Otumpodhu, Avanukku Appaale Pokumpati Oru Ampai Eydhaan.
37 yonaththaan Eydha Ampirukkum Itamattum Pillaiyaantaan Ponapodhu, Ampu Unakku Innum Appaal Irukkiradhu Allavaa Endru Yonaththaan Pillaiyaantaanukkup Pirakeyirundhu Kooppittaan.

38 nee Thariththunirkaamal Theeviriththup Pottenappo Endrum Yonaththaan Pillaiyaantaanukkup Pirakeyirundhu Kooppittaan; Appatiye Yonaththaanin Pillaiyaantaan Ampukalaip Porukki, Than Ejamaanitaththil Kontuvandhaan.
39 andhak Kaariyam Yonaththaanukkum Thaaveedhukkum Therindhirundhadheyallaamal, Andhap Pillaiyaantaanukku Ondrum Theriyaadhirundhadhu.
40 appozhudhu Yonaththaan: Than Aayudhangalaip Pillaiyaantaanitaththil Kotuththu, Ivaikalaip Pattanaththirkuk Kontupo Endraan.

41 pillaiyaantaan Ponapinpu, Thaaveedhu Thenpuramaana Itaththilirundhu Ezhundhuvandhu, Tharaiyile Mukanguppura Vizhundhu, Moondruvisai Vananginaan; Avarkal Oruvarai Oruvar Muththanjeydhu Azhudhaarkal; Thaaveedhu Mikavum Azhudhaan.

42 appozhudhu Yonaththaan Thaaveedhai Nokki: Neer Samaadhaanaththote Pom, Karththar Endraikkum Enakkum Umakkum, En Sandhadhikkum Umadhu Sandhadhikkum Natunirkum Saatchi Endru Solli, Karththarutaiya Naamaththaikkontu Naam Iruvarum Aanaiyittukkontadhai Ninaiththukkollum Endraan.
43 pinpu Avan Ezhundhu Purappattup Ponaan; Yonaththaano Pattanaththirkup Poivittaan.
